user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send an email to me (lisa.caregiver@example.com) with some insights about Ethan to help me get started. Remind her to check her Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi Jane,

I hope you’re well. When you have a moment, could you please email me (lisa.caregiver@example.com) any insights or key details about Ethan that might help me prepare for working with him? 

Feel free to review your Notion notes first—there may be useful information there that I haven’t seen yet.

Thank you so much for your help!

Best,
Lisa

final_output:
